title: Installation issue within dealii: "trilinos"
body:
Dear community,

I´ll try to install dealii onto three Ubuntu 16.04.6 machines and one 18.04.3 LTS machine with gcc 5.4.0 resp. gcc 7.3.0 and the build runs into an error while installing "trilinos".

There´s enough memory and enough disk space for temp. It´s independent if I run the installation with 1 or more cpu cores. 

If you need more information, please let me know.

Thank you very much in advance for your help.

Kind regards,
Christian

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install dealii
```

### Platform and user environment

```
$ uname -a 
Linux fautm223 5.0.0-32-generic #34~18.04.2-Ubuntu SMP Thu Oct 10 10:36:02 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    Ubuntu 18.04.3 LTS

$ uname -a 
Linux kerberos 4.4.0-161-generic #189-Ubuntu SMP Tue Aug 27 08:10:16 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    Ubuntu 16.04.6 LTS
``` 

- `compilers.yaml`

```console

- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: ubuntu16.04
    paths:

      cxx: /usr/bin/g++-5

      fc: /usr/bin/gfortran-5
    spec: gcc@5.4.0
    target: broadwell
- compiler:
    environment: {}

    modules: []

    paths:
      cc: /local/linux/bin/icc-11.1

    spec: intel@11.1

- compiler:

- compiler:

      cc: /usr/bin/gcc-7
      cxx: /usr/bin/g++-7

- compiler:

      cc: /local/linux/bin/icc-11.1
      cxx:

      fc: /local/linux/bin/ifort-11.1
    flags: {}
    operating_system: ubuntu18.04

      fc: /local/linux/bin/ifort
    flags: {}
    operating_system: ubuntu18.04

    extra_rpaths: []
```
